sense.name: an individual's physical strength
sense.examples: Mary could feel the might of the big stallion as he broke into a gallop. The might of the explosion shattered storefront glass six blocks away. The story tells of the might of Hercules and his amazing physical feats.

sense.name: collective authoritative power, resources
sense.examples: The front of the courthouse had the motto 'right is might' carved in stone. The British navy was a great military might in the 19th century. The might of the Roman Empire extended across Europe and Asia Minor.
